{{title|1=operator&amp;,{{!}},^{{small|(std::bitset)}}}}
{{cpp/utility/bitset/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|bitset}}
{{dcla|num=1|noexcept=c++11|constexpr=c++23|1=
template&lt; std::size_t N &gt;
std::bitset&lt;N&gt; operator&amp;( const std::bitset&lt;N&gt;&amp; lhs,
                          const std::bitset&lt;N&gt;&amp; rhs );
}}
{{dcla|num=2|noexcept=c++11|constexpr=c++23|1=
template&lt; std::size_t N &gt;
std::bitset&lt;N&gt; operator{{!}}( const std::bitset&lt;N&gt;&amp; lhs,
                          const std::bitset&lt;N&gt;&amp; rhs );
}}
{{dcla|num=3|noexcept=c++11|constexpr=c++23|1=
template&lt; std::size_t N &gt;
std::bitset&lt;N&gt; operator^( const std::bitset&lt;N&gt;&amp; lhs,
                          const std::bitset&lt;N&gt;&amp; rhs );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Performs binary AND, OR, and XOR between two bitsets, {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}}.

@1@ Returns a {{c|std::bitset&lt;N&gt;}} containing the result of binary AND on corresponding pairs of bits of {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}}.

@2@ Returns a {{c|std::bitset&lt;N&gt;}} containing the result of binary OR on corresponding pairs of bits of {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}}.

@3@ Returns a {{c|std::bitset&lt;N&gt;}} containing the result of binary XOR on corresponding pairs of bits of {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs|the bitset on the left-hand side of the operator}}
{{par|rhs|the bitset on the right-hand side of the operator}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|std::bitset&lt;N&gt;(lhs) &amp;{{=}} rhs}}

@2@ {{c|std::bitset&lt;N&gt;(lhs) {{!=}} rhs}}

@3@ {{c|std::bitset&lt;N&gt;(lhs) ^{{=}} rhs}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;bitset&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::bitset&lt;4&gt; b1("0110");
    std::bitset&lt;4&gt; b2("0011");

    std::cout &lt;&lt; "b1 &amp; b2: " &lt;&lt; (b1 &amp; b2) &lt;&lt; '\n';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "b1 {{!}} b2: " &lt;&lt; (b1 {{!}} b2) &lt;&lt; '\n';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "b1 ^ b2: " &lt;&lt; (b1 ^ b2) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
b1 &amp; b2: 0010
b1 {{!}} b2: 0111
b1 ^ b2: 0101
}}
